div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a vaccine or a null flavor value.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept in ^999000811000001105
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept in ^12465201000001105
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept in ^999000831000001104
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept in ^999000841000001106
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept in ^999000821000001101
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor where concept = NAVU
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor where concept = UNC
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor where concept = UNK
Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor where concept = NA

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a vaccine or a null flavor value.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
